description: In this lab, we will explore the fundamentals of CSS programming and learn how to create beautiful and responsive web layouts. Through hands-on exercises, we will cover topics such as CSS selectors, box model, and positioning, as well as advanced techniques like flexbox and grid. By the end of this lab, you will have the skills and knowledge to create stunning websites that look great on any device.
